author: Katie Shepherd
title: After Fauci urged caution in reopening the economy, Fox News turned to Dr. Phil for a second opinion - The Washington Post
description: After Fauci urged caution in reopening the economy, Fox News turned to Dr. Phil for a second opinion The Washington Post Dr. Anthony Fauci shuts down Laura Ingraham's 'misleading' virus claim AOL Fauci says US can 'approach a significant degree of normality' …
content: He acknowledged that the novel coronavirus is killing Americans more than 33,000 as of early Friday but also wondered why the economy would shut down over the pandemic but continues to function as people die from lung cancer, car crashes and pool drownings. (… [+7156 chars]
